positions.title: ML Engineer
bullets: Developed APIs with FastAPI to expose Machine Learning services to other internal squads.
Created AI agents using LangGraph and LangChain for conversational logic, with cost monitoring via LangSmith. Worked with MCP servers for better encapsulation of the tools used.
Implemented a key feature for the squad, parallelizing a heavy computer vision process, reducing execution time by ~46%.

positions.title: ML Engineer
bullets: Achieved the squad's largest sale ever, reaching 9x the annual target in the total contract, by applying a Python-developed algorithm that combines machine learning models based on performance and cost, in a proof of concept with one of the 10 largest banks in Brazil.
Developed R&D projects aimed at advancing the state of the art in techniques used by data scientists.

Led strategic meetings to share knowledge about widely used machine learning techniques, including model interpretability in the internal audit process of large banks and feature engineering strategies.

positions.title: ML Engineer (Internship)
bullets: Contributed to the development of internal libraries, accelerating the study and experimentation process for the company's data scientists.
Participated in the design of solutions for banks and financial institutions, addressing challenges throughout the credit cycle.

positions.title: ML Engineer
bullets: Participated in the development of a solution for transmission tower inspection, using drones for field image capture, focusing on the classification of anomalies and defects, significantly reducing manual effort in image analysis, mostly without anomalies.

Deployed the production architecture of the models that made up the solution, containerizing and serving them in a Kubernetes infrastructure on Azure (AKS), as well as configuring a monitoring dashboard using Grafana.

positions.title: ML Engineer
bullets: Conducted research and experimentation with state-of-the-art algorithms in the field of federated learning, adapting frameworks (i.e., Flower, PySyft) to meet the project's specific needs.
Developed new datasets to support researchers in the field globally.
Published at the international VISAPP conference (Computer Vision Theory and Applications) the work "FedBID and FedDocs: A Dataset and System for Federated Document Analysis".

positions.title: ML Engineer (Internship)
bullets: Developed an application for capturing and detecting barcodes on automotive production lines at the Stellantis group, reducing manual verification errors by ~63%.
Used YOLO for object detection and Tesseract as OCR.

positions.title: ML Engineer (Internship)
bullets: Implemented a system to generate textual analysis metrics, including readability, coherence, and cohesion, using NLTK and SpaCy.

Applied these metrics in a classifier for university professors' textual feedback, helping manage large volumes of individual evaluations, achieving 95.1% accuracy on a set of 1000 texts evaluated by real professors, using scikit-learn.

projects.title: Writing Test
projects.description: A web platform that tracks and enhances the English writing proficiency of developers through AI-based analysis.

projects.title: Intent Detection
projects.description: BERT-based NLP model to classify user intents and fetch the last three detected intents from a database.

projects.title: Reco - Condominium Debt Negotiation
projects.description: Award-winning web platform automating the negotiation process for defaulting condominium residents. üèÜ 3 Awards.

projects.title: Attention Mechanism
projects.description: Conceptual and practical implementation of attention mechanisms with and without PyTorch for NLP tasks.

projects.title: Granting of Credit
projects.description: End-to-end project for credit risk analysis, involving case study comparison and credit scoring model building.

projects.title: Store Sales Forecast
projects.description: Sales forecasting for Rossmann stores using time series modeling and ML techniques to predict the next 6 weeks.

projects.title: Which Property
projects.description: Data-driven insights project for House Rocket to identify the most profitable property investment opportunities.
